CustomField.formula: IF( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_4_1__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_4_2__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_4_3__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_4_4__c))) ), MAX( VALUE(TEXT(Score_4_1__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_4_2__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_4_3__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_4_4__c)) ), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total score from the Timescales section. Only calculated where all scores are completed.
CustomField.label: Timescales Score
